title: Tomba Email-Count Actor Input
description: Input schema for the Tomba Email-Count Actor that counts email addresses for domains using the Tomba API.

tombaApiKey.title: Tomba API Key
tombaApiKey.description: Your Tomba API key (ta_xxxx). Get it from https://app.tomba.io/api

tombaApiSecret.title: Tomba Secret Key
tombaApiSecret.description: Your Tomba secret key (ts_xxxx). Get it from https://app.tomba.io/api

domains.title: Domains to Count
domains.description: Array of domain names to count email addresses for.

maxResults.title: Maximum Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of domains to process. Default is 50.
